desc.zh-CN: 对图像进行2DGabor小波变换使用方向个数

desc.en-US: The size of 2DGabor kernel which is used to code the palmprint image.
desc.zh-CN: 对图像进行2DGabor小波变换使用的核大小

regulation.en-US: Can not be larger than the size of the palm print image, and must be odd.
regulation.zh-CN: 不能大于掌纹图像的大小，而且必须是奇数

regulation.en-US: 29 is experience, should bigger than this.Should not be too large, will affect the size of the palm print code.Too large size will increase the size of the feature matrix and the cost time of recognition.
regulation.zh-CN: 29是经验值，需要大于等于此值。不宜过大，会影响掌纹的编码大小，过大的尺寸会增加特征矩阵的大小，增加识别耗时

regulation.en-US: 29 is Experience, should bigger than this.Should not be too large, will affect the size of the palm print code.Too large size will increase the size of the feature matrix and the cost time of recognition.
regulation.zh-CN: 29是经验值，需要大于等于此值。不宜过大，会影响掌纹的编码大小，过大的尺寸会增加特征矩阵的大小，增加识别耗时

desc.en-US: The size of laplace kernel which is used to enhance the palmprint image.
desc.zh-CN: 对图像进行增强处理使用的拉普拉斯核大小

regulation.en-US: Can not be larger than the size of the palm print image, and must be odd.
regulation.zh-CN: 不能大于掌纹图像的大小和31(OpenCV规定)，而且必须是奇数

desc.en-US: Palmprint Coding Mode 1: Compression coding (takes up less disk space, but the encoding speed is slower and the matching speed is slower) 2: Fast coding (takes up more disk space, but the encoding speed is faster and the matching speed is faster )
desc.zh-CN: 掌纹编码模式，1：压缩编码（占用较少磁盘空间，但编码速度较慢，同时匹配速度较慢）    2：快速编码（占用较多磁盘空间，但编码速度较快，同时匹配速度较快）

regulation.en-US: Currently only supports two modes (compression / fast), 2 (fast mode) is recommended.
regulation.zh-CN: 目前只支持两种模式（压缩/快速），建议使用2（快速模式）。

desc.en-US: Encoding matching mode, 1: Reliable matching (check the encoding legitimacy when matching, but the matching speed is slower) 2: Speed matching (do not check the encoding legitimacy when matching, but the matching speed is faster).
desc.zh-CN: 编码匹配模式，1：可靠匹配（匹配时检查编码合法性，但匹配速度较慢）    2：极速匹配（匹配时不检查编码合法性，但匹配速度较快）

regulation.en-US: Currently, only two modes are supported (Reliable / Speed). If the palmprint code is obtained from the same configuration and the encoding has not been changed, it is recommended that you use 2 (Speed Matching).
regulation.zh-CN: 目前只支持两种模式（可靠/极速），如果掌纹编码是由同样的配置得到的，并且编码没有被改变，建议您使用2（极速匹配）。
